title: SunTrust
description: SunTrust, a prominent player in the banking and financial services industry, is visually represented by a vibrant color palette consisting of deep navy blue (00447C), warm golden yellow (FDB913), and lively orange (E36F1E). These colors are well recognized and documented from the SunTrust official logo, available at: http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/3/32/SunTrust_Logo.svg.
